title: Riot please look.
body: Why Riot isn't helping me at all to find my main account? The privacy thing won't help at all. I sent lots of mails to support  and they just reply me back with Spanish. Please I wan't to talk to Riot. I want my main account back. My account has been hacked and I tried to find my password and I didn't get any emails.

replies.body: If that other account is hacked and you're getting responses in Spanish, there's a decent chance that the hacker changed your region or language. Reach out to our account team in the [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and they'll be able to help out there. When you submit that ticket, make sure that you are **not** logged in and you should get a response in English.
I've been waiting after I fill out the ticket. But they are never response back
